description: Multiplicative order of 7 mod n, where gcd(n, 7) = 1.
comments: Essentially the same as A050979. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 13 2008]
mathematica: MultiplicativeOrder[7, #] & /@ Select[ Range@ 100, GCD[7, #] == 1 &] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 05 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {for (n=1, nn, if (gcd(n,7) == 1, print1(znorder(Mod(7, n)), ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 06 2015
author: _David W. Wilson_
